overview: Arges Artiaga has participated in the clashes against the Islamic State in the framework of the Syrian war, in which he has been three times. After liberating the city of Raqa from the control of the terrorist group, he has returned to Galicia. He is 43 years old and his life is at a turning point. Trapped in this dilemma, Arges travels to the United Kingdom to meet up with his comrades in arms at the funeral of Jac Holmes, his best friend.
title: Furtive
